General.Name: Real Brokerage Inc
General.Description: The Real Brokerage Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a technology-powered real estate brokerage company. It offers brokerage services for the real estate market through a network of agents. The company provides agents a mobile focused tech-platform to run the business. It operates in the United States, the District of Columbia, and Canada. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 133 Richmond Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2L3
